DOC.brief_summary: Aravind Eye Hospital University California , San Francisco ( UCSF ) Proctor Foundation collaborate Antioxidants Prevention Cataract Study 1997-2002 . ( 1 ) In study , 798 participant age 35-50 year enrol 5 rural village , randomize thrice weekly antioxidant ( vitamin C , 500 mg ; beta carotene , 15 mg ; alpha-tocopherol , 400 IU ) placebo . After 5 year supplementation , significant difference cataract formation antioxidant group placebo . In follow-up study , return study village determine whether rate cataract surgery different 2 group . 1 . Gritz DC , Srinivasan M , Smith SD , et al . The Antioxidants Prevention Cataracts Study : effect antioxidant supplement cataract progression South India . The British journal ophthalmology 2006 ; 90:847-51 .
